level.text: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (b) of this section or § 29- 611.01(a), the law of the jurisdiction in which a partnership has its principal office shall govern relations among the partners and between the partners and the partnership.

The law of District of Columbia shall govern relations among the partners and between the partners and the partnership and the liability of partners for an obligation of a limited liability partnership.
